description: Chelsea: Who should leave as Mauricio Pochettino gets 'tough'?
title: Chelsea: Who should leave as Mauricio Pochettino gets 'tough'?
title_page: Chelsea: Who should leave as Mauricio Pochettino gets 'tough'? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Mauricio Pochettino says he must make "tough" decisions to trim his "massive" Chelsea squad before the end of the transfer window.
Conor Gallagher, Levi Colwill, Romelu Lukaku and Trevoh Chalobah are among those linked with transfers away, while numerous more are in line for loan moves.
So who should leave Stamford Bridge and which player seemingly near the exit should be kept at all costs?
